document_data.mainbody:
za Blouin was an inhabitant of the city of Baldurs Gate in late 15 century DR.
Iza was a blush-skinned half high elf with chestnut hair and blue eyes.
In the , as the Cult of the Absolute menaced the city of Baldurs Gate, Iza could be found gossiping in the Lower City with her friend â€“ Sharlz Molar. Iza eagerly consumed the Baldurs Mouth Gazetteer, and even though she knew one should not believe every word that the broadsheet printed, Iza still avoided associating with individuals who were bad-mouthed by the publication.
